title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Harris tiny crowd size compared to Trump in Arizona. Record 3rd Quarter GDP: 31.2%, V-shaped recovery Trump promised has happened because of Trump's policies, it was not automatic. Fauci advocates locking down for another 111 days. Art Laffer on the greatest recovery ever. You can't get rid of the virus by hiding and shutting down. Trump job creation blows out Obama/Biden. Gasparino: Traders see light at end of tunnel for Trump in swing states. Fauci agrees with Shepard Smith: Lockdowns work. Debbie Dingell warns Dems: Michigan is tight. Jack Nicklaus endorses Trump. Rush tells story of playing with Nicklaus. Newsom's rules for Thanksgiving. Illinois governor re-imposes lockdown restrictions. Andrew Cuomo blames Trump for every COVID death. Why don't we shut down California and see if it works?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Pelosi tries to take credit for the GDP number, says it's the result of stimulus package. Prosperity does not come from government. Democrats and Republicans no longer believe in the same goals. JFK Democrats wanted prosperity for everyone. Democrat govs threaten restaurant owner liquor licenses if they don't comply with lockdowns. Gavin Newsom's Thanksgiving rules only a taste of what's coming if Democrats win. Girl Scouts forced to take down congratulations for Amy Coney Barrett. The Offended are allowed to run the country, if it means tearing down statues, destroying churches, destroying schools. And we've let it happen. The left shouldn't have a prayer of winning this election, but because some people are offended by Trump's personality, they do. Trump is all we have to stand up to the relentless march of the left to erase our culture.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Another pollster sees a Trump win. Trump voters are ticked off at how they've been treated for the last four years. Susquehanna pollster on how other polls are missing Trump voters. Rush JIPs Trump's Tampa rally. California caller: We ignore Newsom's orders. Biden will raise taxes on everyone. Rush rejoins President Trump's rally in Tampa. Josh Hawley on Twitter and the NY Post. Multiculturalism is the root of the vast majority of problems we have in America today.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
